newsitem.title: EU: BUDGETARY CONTROL COMMITTEE AGENDA - FEB 25-26.
newsitem.headline: BUDGETARY CONTROL COMMITTEE AGENDA - FEB 25-26.

text.p: Committee on Budgetary Control [[ Tuesday 25 February 1997 ]] ===] Tuesday 25 February 1997 at 3 pm

2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 16 and 17 December 1996 in Brussels (PE221.152 ) - 16 January 1997 in Strasbourg (PE221.157 ) - 22 and 23 January 1997 in Brussels (PE221.153 ) - 5 and 6 February 1997 in Brussels (PE221.461 )

4.1 HIV/AIDS related operations in developing countries (T03804) **I (T03804) SYN95164 COM(97)0001 C4-0372/96 + CONT Avis A WYNN Terence. (PSE) (PE214.409/DEF) F DEVE Fond ANDRE-LEONARD Anne. (ELD) (PE218.762/DEF) - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the re-examined Commission proposal
4.2 7th Annual Report on the Structural Funds (1995) (T05386) (T05386) COS0515 COM(96)0502 C4-0020/97 + CONT Avis F REGI Fond R NOVO BELENGUER A. (ARE) - Appointment of draftsman

4.3 The powers and obligations of agents authorized by the Commission (Article 18(2) and (3), Regulation No 1552/89) (T05375) (T05375) CNS97016 COM(96)0717 C4-0067/97 + CONT Fond R - Appointment of draftsman ===] In the presence of Mr Patrick EVERARD - Member of the Court of Auditors
5. Discharge 1995 - PHARE and TACIS (PE221.162 ) - Members responsible: Mrs HOFF - Mrs KJER HANSEN - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the basis of 2 working documents (PE221.163 )

6. 1995 discharge - general budget - other sections (T04846) DEC0071 SEC(96)0424 C4-0281/96 + CONT Fond R DANKERT Pieter. (PSE) - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the basis of a working document (PE221.464 ) - (PE221.113/DEF) ===] In the presence of Mr Armindo de Jesus de SOUSA RIBEIRO - Member of the Court of Auditors
7. 1995 discharge - ECSC (T05362) (T05362) DEC0077 + CONT Fond R BLAK Freddy. (PSE) - Adoption of draft report (PE221.167 )
8. Discharge 1995 - Borrowings and loans - Member responsible: F. BLAK - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the basis of a working document (PE221.168 )

9. Discharge 1995 - SEM 2000 - Member responsible: Mr COLOM I NAVAL - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the basis of a working document (PE221.156 ) ===] Wednesday 26 February 1997 - 9 am ===] In the presence of Mr Jan O. KARLSSON - Member of the Court of Auditors

10. Discharge 1995: - CFSP - former Yugoslavia - Palestine (Special Report 4/96 of the Court of Auditors) - Member responsible: Edith MULLER (PE221.463 ) - Development aid - Cooperation with Mediterranean and third countries - Member responsible: Juan Manuel FABRA VALLES - Exchange of views on the basis of 2 working documents (PE221.458) ===] In the presence of Mr Jean-Francois BERNICOT - Member of the Court of Audit ors
11. Discharge 1995 - Own resources - Member responsible: Mr BARDONG - Exchange of views Exchange of views on the basis of 3 working documents (PE 218.772/REV - PE 221.158 - PE 221.457)
12. 1995 discharge - general budget - Section III (T04845) (T04845) DEC0070 SEC(96)0421 C4-0280/96 + CONT Fond R WYNN Terence. (PSE) (PE221.460 ) - General discussion
13. Follow-up 1994 discharge (T05366) (T05366) DEC0081 + CONT Fond R WYNN Terence. (PSE) - Exchange of views
15. Date of next meeting (PE/XV/OJ/97-04 ) - FIN - A END OF DOCUMENT.
